about_the_game:
* Level up your sense of humor and art, while playing!
* Solve social problems whiling travel around the world in a funny way!
* Cat? or Dog? Customize your original main character as you like!
* Up to you play mode [Cozy or Dark], according to your mood.
---
Story mode
　* Cinematic Story (6 min × 18 chapters), each chapter contains new Skill & fresh gimmick
　* A touching story unlike anything you have ever seen before.
Heart wrenching emotional climax (universe, soul, origin of mankind, bond with the owner)
---
Traveling mode
　* 1-6 min / play, Rogue Light type (randomly generated)
> Tourism (Cozy, Werewolf, Relaxation, mini games)
> Exorcism (Beat’em up, Action Platform, mini games)

name: Paw Paw Destiny Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 1.6GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 340 MB available space

short_description: A cosmic horror comedy, free humanity from the cursed ancient cosmic brainwashing, this 2D action / board game allows you to completely unlock your sealed sense of humor and creatively annihilate evils. Become the patron god of the world and turn history into funny way.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Thai, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Indonesian
